flawed_nl_solution:
The normal price of the lessons would be 20*40=$<<20*40=800>>800
The discount saves him 800*0.25=$<<800*0.25=200>>200
So the lessons cost him 800-200=$<<800-200=600>>600
That means everything costs 500+600=$<<500+600=1010>>1010
#### 1010

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1100, not 1010. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
